name: Paulo Carvalho
bio: Interdisciplinary professional specialization in IT Governance (PUC Minas, 2022) and Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Systems from Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG, 2019). I have been involved in strategic positions for more than 10 years, related to the Information Technology market. This also includes conducting viability studies or Research and Development software solutions and communicating tangible benefits to stakeholders.
